entry.title: Python tools to Manage Large Scale
entry.summary:
Description

Python tools to Manage Large Scale, Multi-cloud Deployments

Managing large scale deployments over multiple clouds can be a bit of a hassle. In this talk we will discuss the challenges (and opportunities) Waze found, in it's quest to Outsmart Traffic over GCP and AWS, how we overcame them. We will also showcase our open source python libraries used for that purpose.
